Title: The Brontë Sisters
Writer: Pascal Bonitzer (scenario and dialogue), André Téchiné (scenario and dialogue), Jean Gruault (participation)
Actors: Isabelle Adjani, Marie-France Pisier, Isabelle Huppert, Pascal Greggory
Plot: In a small presbytery in Yorkshire, living under the watchful eyes of their aunt and father, a strict Anglican pastor, the Bronte sisters write their first works and quickly become literary sensations.
